body:
I don't think this should matter: we shouldn't be calling cudaSetDevice/cudaGetDevice until after libATen_gpu.so is loaded, because there is no other way to create GPU tensors. 

We should make the default implementation of cudaSetDevice/cudaGetDevice functions throw an exception (or `abort()`) to ensure that this is the case.
